message: This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price of $100. It's a steal! I'm willing to let it go at this price, but you have to make a decision quickly. What do you say?
This sounds like a great deal! I'll take it.

You're really getting lucky, aren't you? Two high-quality products in a row! I'm starting to think I should raise the price, but I'll stick with the original offer of $100. It's still a great deal, if I do say so myself. What do you think?
Absolutely! I can't resist such a good deal.

I've got a real doozy for you this time! This product is... unique. It's got a certain... je ne sais quoi. And the price? Still just $100! I mean, it's not every day you get to own something that's... one-of-a-kind. What do you say? Are you feeling adventurous?
I am feeling adventurous! Let's do this!
